alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Clovis; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; Planada - Le Grand - Snelling; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 22 at 11:23PM PST until January 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM UNTIL 9 AM PST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile to as low as 200 feet in dense fog. * WHERE...Most of San Joaquin Valley, mainly Merced County southward to Kings and Tulare Counties. * WHEN...1 AM until 9 AM PST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas impacted by dense fog include, but are not limited to, Highways 99, 152, 180, 168, 198, 41, and 43.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
